page.title: 07Employment in N.Wingfield
page.content: Of the 167 families questioned,we found 10 families where both parents had jobs;142 families where 1 parent had a job;and 15 families where both parents were unemployed.In 4 families 1 parent did more than 1 job.This is the type of employment we found: { Employment No. %} Manual worker 148 88.6 Clerical worker 8 4.8 Professional worker 5 3.0 Unemployed 15 9.0 Self-employed 3 1.8 Miner 25 15.0 Shop assistant 6 3.6 Housewife 29 17.4 Mechanic 8 4.8 Electrician 2 1.2 Factory worker 13 7.8
